text.172_Daf, 58_Line: “The Lord is the builder of Jerusalem…” (Psalms 147:2)
text.172_Daf, 56_Line: “You will rise, You will have mercy on Zion…” (Psalms 102:14)
text.172_Daf, 59_Line: And from the beginning (before the destruction) what would they say?
text.172_Daf, 55_Line: This is what Raba bar Rav Shilah said:
text.172_Daf, 61_Line: “For the Lord has chosen Zion; He desired it for His habitation.” (Psalms 132:13)
text.172_Daf, 54_Line: It is written “On your walls, O Jerusalem, I have appointed watchmen; all day and all night, they shall never be silent; those who remind the Lord, be not silent.” (Isaiah 62:6) What do they say?
